subsection.name: Arithmetic operations
subsection.p: Arithmetic operations (add, sub, div, mult etc) are accessible in functional way (can be accessed as static methods from the main Grammar class)

subsection.name: Boolean operations
subsection.p: Boolean operations (add, or, xor, xnor) can be applied to all BooleanExpr objects

subsection.name: Equals and not equals
subsection.p: Equality checks (eq, ne) can be applied to all expressions

subsection.name: Null checks
subsection.p: Null checks can be applied to all path expressions

subsection.name: Simple alias for non-entity paths
subsection.p: All non-entity property paths provide a as (alias) method with a String argument

subsection.name: String operations
subsection.p: String operations (lower, upper, substring) can be applied to all String expressions.
